attributes.action: bring commercial websites which advertise products or services under the jurisdiction of the Advertising Standards Authority
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: At present, commercial websites (that is, websites run by companies to advertise their products or services) are able to make claims for their products or services, without having to substantiate them.  Such websites are, at present, outside the jurisdiction of the Advertising Standards Authority.  The internet is now a very significant advertising tool, and claims made by companies should be subject to the same regulation as advertisements elsewhere.
